title: Starlight Poems
author: Lyra Stone
pages: In the night sky, diamonds glow, casting dreams on earth below. Stars align in celestial dance, guiding lost souls with a glance.
The moon watches with tender light, guarding dreams in the velvet night. Each constellation tells a tale, of faraway lands and distant sail.
In starlit silence, wishes are cast, echoing hopes from the present and past. Celestial paths twined like stitches, weaving dreams and whispered riches.
Let us walk beneath the starlit dome, where dreams reside and wanderers roam. In the glow of the nightâ€™s gentle guide, our hearts find peace side by side.
